text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi SkanRay/Mahindra ventilator, especially designed for Coronavirus, is ready for production. Thankfully there is no demand. Despite the ingenuity and many weeks of hard work by our engineers, we hope the machines never have to leave our factories. ⁦⁦@MahindraRise⁩
